name: Monkey Adventures With David Zimmerman
description:
Game description:

The game is a thrilling adventure played by a monkey. To finish the game you must lead the monkey through the jungle, caves, water, desert and a temple. This is an epic adventure that has different obstacles in every direction and area and is a world unlike any other.  The Monkey, David Zimmermann is adamant of getting what he wants but there are mad and angry monkeys along the adventure that will try and kill the monkey first with bananas then with knives but if finished you will be dancing on clouds. 

Controls: WASD or arrow keys for movement, SPACE BAR for jump
